snippet.title: ENG - Ostera: The curse of... - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Ostera: The curse of... by Profits Troll Studio ! 

After accidentally crushing the gods' chosen hero, you have no choice but to take his place and protect Belharock. Are you ready to embrace a fate that was never meant to be yours?

👉 One wishlisht = A happy troll: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1803360/Ostera__The_curse_of/

Available on Steam on March 2025!

Follow on :
Twitter:   https://x.com/Profits_troll
Bluesky:   https://bsky.app/profile/profitstroll.bsky.social
Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/profitstrollstudio/
